combobox.desc: With combobox you can allow a user to create new values that may not be present in a provided items list. Keep in mind, this component only supports arrays of **primitive** items and cannot be used with props such as `item-text`, `item-value` for example.

comboboxMultiple.desc: This is a multple version of **combobox** - user is allowed to enter more than 1 value

scopedSlots.desc: With the power of scoped slots, you can customize the visual output of the select. In this example we add a profile picture for both the chips and list items.

customFilter.desc: The `filter` prop can be used to filter each individual item with custom logic. In this example we filter items by name

asynchronous.desc: Sometimes you need to load data externally based upon a search query. Use the `search-input` prop with the **.sync** modifier when using the `autocomplete` prop. We also make use of the new `cache-items` prop. This will keep a unique list of all items that have been passed to the `items` prop and is **REQUIRED** when using asynchronous items and the **multiple** prop.

slots.item: Scoped slot for designating the markup for a list-tile
slots.selection: Scoped slot for designating the markup for the selected items
